alert.note: Alert for Stillwater; Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 4:33AM MDT until June 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of south central Montana, including the following counties, Stillwater and Yellowstone. * WHEN...Until 800 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 432 AM MDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in the last few hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Billings, Laurel, Billings West End, Billings Heights, Lockwood, Molt and Acton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
